kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Password
kw.doc: Types the given password into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Open Mailbox
kw.doc: Open IMAP email client session to given ``host`` with given ``user`` and ``password``.

kw.name: Wait For Email
kw.doc: Wait for email message to arrived base on any given filter criteria. Returns email index of the latest email message received.

kw.name: Get Email Body
kw.doc: Returns the decoded email body on multipart email message, otherwise returns the body text.

kw.name: Get Regexp Matches
kw.doc: Returns a list of all non-overlapping matches in the given string.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
